item.title: What would you do with Â£11 billion
item.dc:creator: @H-A-X H-A-X
item.description:
@H-A-X wrote:

Well, as some random guy said before, enhance it into canadian dollars on a 2.3:1 scale so i have $23bil, then buy obviously best computer made, enhance it, best internet connection, buy jagex, enhance runescape graphically, buy a company, invest the money, become richer, buy a dodge viper in red, black racing stripes, red neon glow, tinted black windows, chrome rims, exhaust’s, buy me a fucking whore! Massive party, erm, probably can think of alot more but can’t be arsed.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you do with Â£11 billion

item.title: What would you do with Â£11 billion
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

Donate to foster children, donate to animal shelters. Anything else that needs it.
Buy a house, people I like can hang at my house too. Buy luxurious things. Or live on an island.
Finish school, go to college. Get a job, be very smart. A Boss of some sort of smart business.
So i can be so rich, I’m a celebrity. Pass on my money to my family.

You guys had alot of horrid answers, btw. With a heart like that, I don’t think you’ll ever get the money.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Slayerexpert wrote:

I would make it into some random crappy number with cents by converting it to some currency we americans can use. And I would buy a bunch of money on rs and buy all the randoms and alch them. Then I would buy a billion rolls of duct tape and make a statue of a cow…and burn it…so yeah

item.title: What would you do with Â£11 billion
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

I’d make money about the easiest way I know. First, I would have it converted to USD. Then I’d wait until the price of the euro went up, and I’d transferr it back over and make quite a bit of money.

item.description:
@TheSorrow wrote:

Cash it in for american dollars and get my self a nice house, nice car, nice compuer. Start/take over a company. Start my own airlines. A yacht. maids and butlers. I dont know how much i would have after all that. I might invest after that.
